messages.text: Hey, Mom!
Arrey! Kaise ho beta?
Sab thik hai, bas kaam mein busy hoon.
Haan, samajh gayi thi. Sab kaise chal raha hai?
Thoda hectic hai, par manage kar le raha hoon.
Accha hai! Koi madad chahiye?
Nahi, abhi ke liye sab theek hai. Par thank you!
Theek hai, dhyaan rakhna apna!
Haan, haan, bas abhi thoda break le raha hoon.
Acha! Aur aaj dinner mein kya bana rahe ho?
Socha tha pasta bana leta hoon.
Mmmm, pasta! Bilkul banta hai!
Haan, simple hai aur jaldi ho jaata hai.
Bilkul! Enjoy karo apna dinner.
Thanks, Mom! Tumhara bhi khayal rakhna.
Haan, beta. Tumhare bina sab kuch udaas lagta hai.
Aww, Mom, don’t worry, I’m just a message away!
I know, beta! Par teri yaad aati hai har waqt.
I miss you too, Mom. We should meet soon!
Bilkul, jaldi milte hain! I love you!
Love you too, take care!
